features.featureTitle: Create a new informational page (e.g., RightsPage.tsx) titled 'Know Your Healthcare Rights' that educates users about their fundamental rights as patients and healthcare consumers. Include sections covering: (1) the right to receive emergency care regardless of insurance status or ability to pay, (2) the right to receive an itemized bill and dispute charges, (3) the right to request an interpreter or language assistance services, (4) the right to access and obtain copies of your medical records, (5) the right to a second opinion, (6) the right to appeal insurance denials, and (7) protections against surprise billing. Present content using cards, callout boxes, and short readable sections consistent with the existing warm teal-green design system (matching the style of ChallengesPage.tsx and other informational pages in the app).

Register the new Rights page as a route in App.tsx (e.g., at path '/healthcare-rights') and add a navigation link for it in Navigation.tsx so users can discover and access it from the persistent site-wide nav bar. Additionally, add a quick-link card for the Rights page on the HomePage quick-links grid so users can find it from the main entry point of the app.
